  , H5 = {
    "\n  fragment TeamLinkWithMiniProfile on Team {\n    id\n    handle\n    name\n  }\n": qq,
    "\n  fragment UserLinkWithMiniProfile on User {\n    id\n    username\n  }\n": Lq,
    "\n  query AssetSelectorQuery(\n    $teamHandle: String!\n    $query: String\n    $assetType: [String!]\n    $first: Int\n    $after: String\n    $eligibleForBounty: Boolean\n    $startDate: DateTime\n  ) {\n    team(handle: $teamHandle) {\n      id\n      handle\n      structured_scope_asset_types\n      offers_bounties\n      structured_scopes(\n        start_date: $startDate\n        after: $after\n        first: $first\n        archived: false\n        search: $query\n        eligible_for_submission: true\n        eligible_for_bounty: $eligibleForBounty\n        asset_type: $assetType\n        order_by: { field: asset_identifier, direction: ASC }\n      ) {\n        pageInfo {\n          hasNextPage\n          endCursor\n        }\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            databaseId: _id\n            asset_type\n            asset_identifier\n            eligible_for_submission\n            eligible_for_bounty\n            max_severity\n            instruction\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": Yq,
    "\n  mutation CreateLanguageModelResolverJob(\n    $resolver: String!\n    $input: String\n    $variables: JSON\n  ) {\n    createLanguageModelResolverJob(\n      input: { resolver: $resolver, input: $input, variables: $variables }\n    ) {\n      language_model_resolver_job {\n        id\n        state\n        response\n      }\n\n      errors {\n        nodes {\n          field\n          message\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": Qq,
    "\n  query ReadLanguageModelResolverJob($id: ID!) {\n    node(id: $id) {\n      ... on LanguageModelResolverJob {\n        id\n        state\n        response\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": Kq,
    "\n  mutation BookmarkTeam($teamId: ID!) {\n    updateBookmarkedTeam(input: { team_id: $teamId }) {\n      team {\n        id\n        bookmarked\n      }\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            message\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": Xq,
    "\n  mutation UpdateUserOpportunitiesFeedback(\n    $input: UpdateUserOpportunitiesFeedbackInput!\n  ) {\n    updateUserOpportunitiesFeedback(input: $input) {\n      team {\n        id\n        user_feedback {\n          id\n          likes_team\n        }\n      }\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            message\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": Jq,
    "\n  mutation RemoveUserOpportunitiesFeedback(\n    $input: RemoveUserOpportunitiesFeedbackInput!\n  ) {\n    removeUserOpportunitiesFeedback(input: $input) {\n      team {\n        id\n        user_feedback {\n          id\n          likes_team\n        }\n      }\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            message\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": Zq,
    "\n  mutation CreatePentester($pentester_position_id: ID!) {\n    createPentester(input: { pentester_position_id: $pentester_position_id }) {\n      pentester_position {\n        id\n        i_applied\n        i_can_apply\n        i_can_revoke\n        i_accepted\n      }\n      pentester {\n        id\n      }\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            message\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": eL,
    "\n  mutation AcceptReportCollaboratorInvitation($token: String!) {\n    acceptReportCollaboratorInvitation(input: { token: $token }) {\n      was_successful\n    }\n  }\n": tL,
    "\n  mutation RejectInvitation($token: String!) {\n    rejectInvitation(input: { token: $token }) {\n      was_successful\n    }\n  }\n": sL,
    "\n  query MyCollaborationInvites {\n    me {\n      id # Needed to merge different 'me' queries\n      collaboration_invitations {\n        nodes {\n          id\n          token\n          split_percentage\n          state\n          created_at\n          invited_by {\n            id\n            username\n            profile_picture(size: small)\n            cleared\n            verified\n          }\n          team {\n            handle\n            name\n            profile_picture(size: small)\n          }\n          report {\n            _id\n            title\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": nL,
    "\n  query UserSurveyEligibility($teamHandle: String!) {\n    me {\n      id\n      program_satisfaction_survey_eligibility_status(handle: $teamHandle)\n    }\n  }\n": iL,
    "\n  query Campaign($organizationHandle: String) {\n    me {\n      id\n      teams(\n        where: {\n          type: { _in: [BugBountyProgram, Legacy] }\n          organization: { handle: { _eq: $organizationHandle } }\n        }\n        secure_order_by: { name: { _direction: ASC } }\n        permissions: [program_management]\n      ) {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            name\n            handle\n            state\n            bounty_table {\n              id\n              bounty_table_rows {\n                edges {\n                  node {\n                    id\n                    low\n                    medium\n                    high\n                    critical\n                    low_minimum\n                    medium_minimum\n                    high_minimum\n                    critical_minimum\n                  }\n                }\n              }\n            }\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": aL,
    "\n  mutation SaveCollaboratorsMutation($input: SaveCollaboratorsMutationInput!) {\n    saveCollaborators(input: $input) {\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            message\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": rL,
    "\n  query ReportCollaboratorQuery($reportId: Int!) {\n    report(id: $reportId) {\n      report_collaborators {\n        total_count\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            user {\n              id\n              username\n            }\n            bounty_weight\n          }\n        }\n      }\n      report_collaborator_invitations {\n        total_count\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            state\n            email\n            bounty_weight\n            recipient {\n              id\n              username\n            }\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": oL,
    "\n  mutation RemoveHackerFromProgram(\n    $team_handle: String!\n    $username: String!\n    $reason: String!\n  ) {\n    removeHackerFromProgram(\n      input: { team_handle: $team_handle, username: $username, reason: $reason }\n    ) {\n      was_successful\n    }\n  }\n": lL,
    "\n  mutation StartIdVerification {\n    startIdVerification(input: {}) {\n      url\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            type\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": dL,
    "\n  query SpotCheckReportQuery($spot_check_id: Int!) {\n    me {\n      id\n      spot_checks(where: { id: { _eq: $spot_check_id } }, first: 1) {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            _id\n            id\n            name\n            start_date\n            budget\n            scopes\n            spot_check_reports {\n              id\n              state\n              executive_summary\n              findings_and_evidence\n              methodology_and_tooling\n              scope\n              time_spent\n              attachments {\n                id\n                _id\n                file_name\n                file_size\n                content_type\n                expiring_url\n              }\n            }\n            spot_check_users {\n              submission_deadline\n              submission_deadline_passed\n            }\n            team {\n              id\n              name\n              handle\n              profile_picture(size: medium)\n            }\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": cL,
    "\n  query MySpotChecksQuery {\n    me {\n      id\n      spot_checks(where: { spot_check_users: { state: { _eq: accepted } } }) {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            _id\n            id\n            name\n            start_date\n            budget\n            scopes\n            spot_check_reports {\n              id\n              state\n            }\n            spot_check_users {\n              submission_deadline\n              submission_deadline_passed\n            }\n            team {\n              id\n              name\n              handle\n              profile_picture(size: medium)\n            }\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": uL,
    "\n  mutation CreateSpotCheckReport($input: CreateSpotCheckReportInput!) {\n    createSpotCheckReport(input: $input) {\n      spot_check_report {\n        id\n        _id\n        state\n      }\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            type\n            field\n            message\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": pL,
    "\n  mutation EditSpotCheckReport($input: EditSpotCheckReportInput!) {\n    editSpotCheckReport(input: $input) {\n      spot_check_report {\n        id\n        _id\n        state\n      }\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            type\n            field\n            message\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": mL,
    "\n  query ReputationHistoryQuery(\n    $first: Int\n    $last: Int\n    $after: String\n    $before: String\n  ) {\n    me {\n      id\n      username\n      changes: reputation_changes(\n        first: $first\n        after: $after\n        before: $before\n        last: $last\n      ) {\n        total_count\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            change\n            reason\n            created_at\n            team {\n              id\n              handle\n              name\n              profile_picture(size: small)\n            }\n            report {\n              id\n              _id\n              url\n            }\n          }\n        }\n        pageInfo {\n          hasNextPage\n          hasPreviousPage\n          startCursor\n          endCursor\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": hL,
    "\n  query ImpactHistoryQuery(\n    $first: Int\n    $last: Int\n    $after: String\n    $before: String\n  ) {\n    me {\n      id\n      username\n      changes: impact_changes(\n        first: $first\n        after: $after\n        before: $before\n        last: $last\n      ) {\n        total_count\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            change\n            reason\n            created_at\n            team {\n              id\n              handle\n              name\n              profile_picture(size: small)\n            }\n            report {\n              id\n              _id\n              url\n            }\n          }\n        }\n        pageInfo {\n          hasNextPage\n          hasPreviousPage\n          startCursor\n          endCursor\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": gL,
    "\n  query SignalHistoryQuery(\n    $first: Int\n    $last: Int\n    $after: String\n    $before: String\n  ) {\n    me {\n      id\n      username\n      changes: signal_changes(\n        first: $first\n        after: $after\n        before: $before\n        last: $last\n      ) {\n        total_count\n        edges {\n          node {\n            id\n            change\n            reason\n            created_at\n            team {\n              id\n              handle\n              name\n              profile_picture(size: small)\n            }\n            report {\n              id\n              _id\n              url\n            }\n          }\n        }\n        pageInfo {\n          hasNextPage\n          hasPreviousPage\n          startCursor\n          endCursor\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": _L,
    "\n  mutation OptOutForBetterNotificationsMutation($key: String!) {\n    optOutForFeatureMutation(input: { key: $key }) {\n      was_successful\n      errors {\n        edges {\n          node {\n            message\n            type\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n": fL,
